properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 5:54AM EST until February 10 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson KY
properties.description:
...Forecast Flooding Changed from Minor to Moderate Severity for
the following rivers in Kentucky...

The Cumberland River at Pineville
The Cumberland River at Barbourville
The Cumberland River at Williamsburg

* The Flood Warning continues for
the Cumberland River at Williamsburg
* until late Sunday night.
* At 5 AM Thursday the stage was 22.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 21.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* The river will continue rising to near 31.5 feet after
midnight tonight. The river will fall below flood stage
early Monday morning.
* At 31.0 feet...flooding threatens many homes and businesses. Roads
begin to flood, severing evacuation routes. Major flooding
threatens downtown area.
properties.instruction:
A Flood Warning means that flooding is occurring or is imminent.

Continue to monitor NOAA weather radio or your favorite local media
outlet for additional information. If you are in areas affected by
this forecast take necessary precautions.

The next update will be issued by noon today.

NWSheadline: Forecast flooding increased from minor to moderate severity
